ygData.messageBody:
>Message: 10
Date: Tue, 11 Jan 2000 20:15:30 EST
From: SPRUSBRUCE@...
>Subject: Mistmooore

>yeah alota my friends LOVED Mistmore I mean simply in love with
>it...Definantly one of my favorite zone...I remember everyone was >level 40
>we
>had three group and we were clearing first part of castle well we
**snip**

Mistmoore is alright. I think it's very suited for us wizzies..most of the
casters there will fall pretty quickly for a one-on-one. But I somehow
gravitated to Cazic more because it had better loot and a better chance to
group. I started there at around 24 and the xp skyrocketed well into the
lower 30's.

Paw is an interesting suggestion to. Last night was my first experience
back there since the upgrade...most of the Mob's in there were blue to me at
34, but I was surprised how well they fought...felt like we were fighting
yellows. I think it's probably easier in Cazic.

Aviaks in Karanas are good between 20-22 I'd say, but you'll find it
frustrating not to be able to participate with groups hitting the big-birdy
Avocates. =) It got achingly slow with xp at level 23-24.

-- Lim'Dul 34 HE Wiz Veeshan
Jukka 18 Ogre SMN Quellious
